key.name: notify-on-useronlinestatuschange
key.summary: Should skype-wrapper use the Desktop Notification to notify you when someone goes online and offline?

key.name: notify-on-messagerecieve
key.summary: Should skype-wrapper use the Desktop Notification to notify you when you receive a message?

key.name: notify-on-initializing
key.summary: Should skype-wrapper use a Skype like approach by notifying you of online users during startup?
